darkhistory.electrons.ics.engloss_diff_terms

darkhistory.electrons.ics.engloss_diff_terms¶

Functions for computing the ICS energy loss spectrum by small parameter expansion.

Functions

F0_up_down_diff(beta, delta, T[, as_pairs]) Computes the F0_upscatter - F0_downscatter term.
F0_up_down_sum(beta, delta, T[, as_pairs]) Computes the F0_upscatter + F0_downscatter term.
F1_up_down(beta, delta, T[, as_pairs]) Computes the F1_upscatter - F1_downscatter term.
F_inv_up_down(beta, delta, T[, as_pairs]) Computes the F_inv_upscatter - F_inv_downscatter term.
F_rem(beta, delta, T[, as_pairs]) Computes the F_rem term.
engloss_diff_expansion(beta, delta, T[, …]) Computes the difference expansion term for the new spectrum.
